name: extend
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: extend
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to add to something in order to make it bigger or longer

example.eg: We have plans to extend our house (= to make it bigger).
The government has produced a series of leaflets designed to extend (= increase) public awareness of the dangers of AIDS.
example.egtrans: 政府印发了一系列传单，旨在加强公众对艾滋病危害的认识。

example.eg: We're planning to extend our publishing of children's books (= increase it).
example.egtrans: 我们正计划扩展儿童图书的出版业务。

example.eg: The bar has recently extended its opening hours (= made them longer).
example.egtrans: 酒吧最近延长了营业时间。

example.eg: I need to extend my visa (= make it last longer).

dsense.name: extend
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: We've extended a clothesline (= made it reach) between two trees in the garden.
example.egtrans: 我们在花园里两棵树之间系了根晾衣绳。

example.eg: He extended his hand as a greeting (= held out his hand for someone to shake it).

dsense.name: extend
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: The Sahara Desert extends for miles.
example.egtrans: 撒哈拉沙漠绵延数百英里。

example.eg: The path extends beyond the end of the road.
example.egtrans: 这条小路一直通到大路尽头很远的地方。

example.eg: Rain is expected to extend to (= arrive in) all parts of the country by this evening.
example.egtrans: 预计今天傍晚之前降雨范围会扩大到全国各个地区。

example.eg: The effects of this legislation will extend (= reach) further than the government intends.
example.egtrans: 这项立法所产生的影响将比政府预期的更为深远。

dsense.name: extend
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to offer or give something to someone

example.eg: I should like to extend my thanks to you for your kindness.
example.egtrans: 对您的好意我谨致以衷心感谢。

example.eg: The chairperson extended a warm welcome to the guest speaker.
example.egtrans: 主席向特邀演讲人表示热烈欢迎。

example.eg: The government is extending aid to people who have been affected by the earthquake.
example.egtrans: 政府正在为地震受灾居民提供援助。

example.eg: The bank has agreed to extend us money/extend money to us (= lend us money) to buy our house.
example.egtrans: 银行已经同意向我们提供购房贷款。

dsense.name: extend
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to include or affect someone or something

example.eg: Parking restrictions do not extend to disabled people.
example.egtrans: 停车限制不适用于残疾人士。

example.eg: Her new-found tolerance does not extend to single mothers.
example.egtrans: 她近来培养出一颗包容之心，可是对单身母亲仍然谈不上宽容。

example.eg: The invitation did not extend to family members.
example.egtrans: 受邀者不能带家属赴约。

dsense.name: extend
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to cause someone to use all their ability
trans_examp.trans_cn: 使发挥才干；使才尽其用；使竭尽全力

example.eg: She feels that her job doesn't extend her enough.
example.egtrans: 她觉得她的工作不能充分发挥她的才干。
